metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8517 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The fetch_url function in usr.bin/ftp/fetch.c in tnftp, as used in NetBSD5.1 through 5.1.4, 5.2 through 5.2.2, 6.0 through 6.0.6, and 6.1 through6.1.5 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via a | (pipe)character at the end of an HTTP redirect.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8517` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tnftp - 20130505-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tnftp package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20130505-2').
